```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)

library(stringr)
```

```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, include=FALSE}
source('data_processing_cleaning.R')
```

## Plots

```{r}
race_df |>
  filter(Race %in% c('Asian', 'White', 'Black', 'Hispanic')) |>
  ggplot() +
  aes( x = Academic_Year, 
       y = Count, 
       col = Race,
       group = Race) +
  geom_line()

```

```{r}
race_df |>
  filter(Race %in% c('Asian', 'White', 'Black', 'Hispanic')) |>
  ggplot() +
  aes( x = Academic_Year, 
       y = Count, 
       fill = Race) +
  geom_col(position = 'fill')

```
